name: .ISH2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .ISH2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Flipbook, or "Flipbook-ish," document created by Animation-ish, a drawing creativity application; contains a sequence of frames, which are drawn by the user; can be animated in the software at multiple speeds.

content: ISH2 files are used for storing intermediate complexity drawings in educational environments. They are more complex than "Wiggledoodle-ish" documents (.ISH1 files), but simpler than "Advanced-ish" documents (.ISH3 files).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
